org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.wal

类 MetricsWALSourceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.metrics.BaseSourceImpl
      • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.wal.MetricsWALSourceImpl
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.metrics.BaseSource, MetricsWALSource, org.apache.hadoop.metrics2.MetricsSource

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
public class MetricsWALSourceImpl
extends org.apache.hadoop.hbase.metrics.BaseSourceImpl
implements MetricsWALSource
    Class that transitions metrics from MetricsWAL into the metrics subsystem. Implements BaseSource through BaseSourceImpl, following the pattern.
    另请参阅:
    MetricsWALSource
